description: The Drylands Agroecology Research (DAR) initiative focuses on regenerating landscapes to combat desertification and enhance ecological health. DAR employs innovative agroecological practices, such as contour swales and agroforestry, to improve soil health and water retention. The organization emphasizes community engagement, food sovereignty, and collaboration with indigenous peoples, aiming to redefine the human-land relationship while producing nutritious food for local communities.
name: Drylands Agroecology
